name: Shrek 2: Team Action
description:
Shrek 2: Team Action is an action, adventure and platformer game developed by Beenox. It came out on 03-11-2004. It was published by Activison. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Shrek 2: Team Action on PC.
It was scored by Kevin Manthei, Kevin Riepl and Rob Berry.
